channel.title: [Runesource/Azure] 2006 Remade - 2006 replica
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/sz7ksl.jpg[/img]
The server base is [b]Runesource/Azure[/b]
[b]The Red color means the feature has not been started.[/b] [b]The Orange color means the feature has been started but not yet completed.[/b] [b]The Green color means the feature has been completed.[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][b]Combat:[/b] [ul][*]PvP fully complete [*]PvN fully complete [*]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) [*]Perfect max hit formulas [*]Perfect accuracy formula [*]Every weapon special attack [*]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) [*]Equipment requirements [*]Degradable equipment [*]Weapon poisoning[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img][b]Prayer:[/b] [ul][*]All bones bury-able [*]All prayer's working correctly [*]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img][b]Mining:[/b] [ul][*]Empty and refilling rock's [*]All ore can be mined [*]Correct pickaxes finding and animation's [*]Prospecting [*]Random chance of obtaining gem's [*]Rune essence [*]Granite [*]Sand-Stone[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img][b]Smithing:[/b] [ul][*]All bars can be made [*]All bars can be forged into items [*]All equipment can be produced [*]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img][b]Fishing:[/b] [ul][*]All fish can be caught [*]Big net fishing [*]Correct item requirements [*]Fishing spots located all around the world [*]Correct animations [*]Moving fishing locations[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img][b]Cooking:[/b] [ul][*]Bread [*]Pizza [*]Pie [*]Cake [*]Stew [*]Wine [*]Tea [*]Brewing [*]Potatoes [*]Diary [*]Gnome [*]Dough making [*]Meat/fish [*]Correct animation and timing used [*]Correct burn rate[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][b]Woodcutting:[/b] [ul][*]All tree's cut-able [*]Stumps and re-growing tree's [*]Correct axes finding and animation's [*]Bird's nest[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img][b]Firemaking:[/b] [ul][*]All logs light able [*]Ashes appear after logs burn out [*]Correct animations [*]Clipped[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][b]Crafting:[/b] [ul][*]Basic crafting (Battle-staffs & cape coloring) [*]Leather crafting [*]Tanning [*]Spinning wheel [*]Pottery (fired and UN-fired item's) [*]Gem cutting [*]Jewelry [*]Glass making [*]Weaving[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img][b]Runecrafting:[/b] [ul][*]All altars working [*]Correct multiple crafting [*]Talismans "pull" to altars [*]Tiaras enchanting[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img][b]Fletching:[/b] [ul][*]All log's can be fletched [*]Bow stringing [*]Arrow/dart making[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img][b]Thieving:[/b]
[ul][*]Stall Thieving [*]NPC Thieving [*]Correct anims & gfx [*]Correct Re-spawn Times[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img][b]Herblore:[/b] [ul][*]Herb identifying [*]Creating potions (including coconut milk) [*]Weapon poisoning [*]Cleaning weapon poisoning with cleaning cloth [*]Crushing chocolate bars, unicorn horns, dragon scale and bird nests[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img][b]Slayer:[/b] [ul][*]All slayer masters [*]All slayer Monsters [*]Slayer gem [*]Slayer shop [*]Slayer level to attack slayer monsters[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img][b]Agility:[/b] [ul][*]Looking up...[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NYu86.gif[/img][b]Farming:[/b] [ul][*]Looking up...[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][b]Quest:[/b] [ul][*]Tutorial Island [*]Rest will be added after Pre-Alpha[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img][b]Music & Sounds[/b] [ul][*]All skilling sounds [*]All combat sounds [*]Working music player and unlocking [*]Music playing in all regions [*]Music fade and volume control[/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img][b]Random Events:[/b] [ul][*]Looking up...[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img][b]Miscellaneous[/b] [ul][*]Yet to come...[/ul]

item.title: [Runesource/Azure] 2006 Remade - 2006 replica
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:40, topic:468833”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=585824.msg4328941#msg4328941 date=1373388311]

You can no longer mage/range through walls!
[/quote]nice one…starting to see more and more projectile clipping
please adjust the background color so it’s visible.

Our new forums are still getting worked on, should be done sometime this week.

OT: re-wrote Fishing, still adding in missing fishing location’s.[/quote]good job with fishing

by the way say background issue with quoting a person on forums just fyi for your web dev

and lol…

apparently my fame goes further…

http://2006remade.com/showthread.php?tid=1&pid=28#pid28

Read full topic
